name: qbittorrent
tagline: An open source BitTorrent client with a web interface
description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client with a built-in search engine, sequential downloading, integrated RSS, and remote control via web UI. It runs on all major desktop platforms.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Query multiple torrent sites simultaneously from the application without opening a browser

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Download files in order for streaming media while the torrent is still active

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Control downloads remotely through a responsive web interface accessible from any device

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Set upload and download speed limits based on time of day to manage network usage

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Block or allow connections from specific IP ranges to enhance privacy and security

features.title: Category Management
features.description: Organize torrents into categories with separate save paths and rules
